law.catch_line: Stabilization and decommissioning of facility owned by Commonwealth.
law.text: The Energy and Environment Cabinet shall proceed toward the stabilization and decommissioning of any nuclear waste facility owned by the Commonwealth on July 15, 1980, as expeditiously as is reasonably possible in order to place the facility in such a condition that active ongoing maintenance is eliminated and only surveillance and monitoring are required.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 316, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 17, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
